page.title: 07LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: There are very few facilities for leisure and recreation apart from a network of{public footpaths. The footpaths in the Roud area do not look like they are used very often. They are not all clearly marked at the road and are overgrown.The small stiles are unstable and starting to decay. The bridge which crossed a small muddy stream was old and decrepit. One end is falling apart. It was hard to continue along the footpath as it was overgrown with stinging nettles and thistles. There are only two footpaths going in and out of Roud. This could be because Roud is not widely known. Roud has no facilities for leisure such as a recreation or football ground.
